name: RetrieveCaseInfo
description:
Retrieve detailed information about a specific case in an organization.

This tool is used to get detailed information about a case in an organization using Miro's API. It is suitable for Enterprise plan users with the Enterprise Guard add-on who have Company Admin and eDiscovery Admin roles. Useful for administrators managing cases and overseeing organizational operations.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the organization for retrieving case information.

value_schema.description: The ID of the organization for which you want to retrieve the case information.

parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the case to retrieve information for.

value_schema.description: The ID of the case you want to retrieve.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.description: The ID of the organization for which you want to retrieve the case information.

value_schema.description: The ID of the organization for which you want to retrieve the case information.

parameters.description: The ID of the case you want to retrieve.

value_schema.description: The ID of the case you want to retrieve.
